text.text_translated: Sometimes, when a bridge falls down, it is a mystery, and engineers only find out why after they do a full study. This can happen because poor quality material was used when the bridge was built, or because there was a problem with an important part of the bridge. Also, sometimes a bridge was only designed to hold a certain amount of weight, and it cannot hold more than that.
